SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.networking.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Runnable, Remote
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements VirtualView, Runnable
The ClientSocket class implements the VirtualView interface and handles the server socket communication with the client.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientSocket

      public ClientSocket(Socket serSocket, BlockingQueue<Action> serverActions, BlockingQueue<Action> clientActions, ArrayList<VirtualView> clients, boolean gameStarted, int playersNumber) throws IOException
      Constructs a ClientSocket instance.
      Parameters:
      serSocket - the socket connected to the server.
      serverActions - the queue for actions server receives from the client.
      clientActions - the queue for actions server sends to the client.
      clients - the list of connected clients.
      gameStarted - the status of whether the game has started.
      playersNumber - the number of players in the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
